original_text: A person who teaches his own ideas wants people to think that he himself is great. But I want to show that the one who sent me is great. A person like that is honest and there is nothing false in him.
korean_text: 스스로 말하는 자는 자기 영광만 구하되 보내신 이의 영광을 구하는 자는 참되니 그 속에 불의가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: A person who teaches his own ideas
wants people to think that he himself is great
sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 위대하다고 사람들이 생각하게 하고 싶어한다

sentences.original_text: that the one who sent me is great
A person like that is honest
and there is nothing false in him
